definition[0]: a graphic account or description of an event is very clear and gives a lot of details, especially unpleasant ones
example[0]: a graphic account of her unhappy childhood
example[1]: His illness is described in graphic detail.
definition[1]: connected with or including drawing, printing, or designing
definition[2]: relating to drawing, printing, designing etc
example[4]: displays ofgraphic arts, including architectural drawings
definition[3]: a picture on a computer screen
definition[4]: a drawing giving information in a newspaper, magazine, television news programme etc
example[6]: The graphic with the article shows the proportion of female workers in various industries.
